entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
